vote.title: Authorize (1) an Interlocal Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation (TxDOT) - Aviation Division to perform a phased Taxiway Echo design and construction project at Dallas Executive Airport as part of the capital improvement plan under the TxDOT’s State Block Grant Program in the amount up to $4,633,000.00; TxDOT under the State Block Grant Program will provide 90 percent of the project costs up to $4,169,700.00; (2) the City to match 10 percent of the project costs; and (3) execution of the Interlocal Agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the  agreement - Total not to exceed $463,300.00 - Financing:  Aviation Construction Fund
vote.description: Authorize (1) an Interlocal Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation (TxDOT) - Aviation Division to perform a phased Taxiway Echo design and construction project at Dallas Executive Airport as part of the capital improvement plan under the TxDOT’s State Block Grant Program in the amount up to $4,633,000.00; TxDOT under the State Block Grant Program will provide 90 percent of the project costs up to $4,169,700.00; (2) the City to match 10 percent of the project costs; and (3) execution of the Interlocal Agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the  agreement - Total not to exceed $463,300.00 - Financing:  Aviation Construction Fund
